case.title: Seeking room - open minded apt to clean (manhattan only)
case.text:
Sexy and exotic Domme seeks room for domestic training.
Let me borrow your living room for a couple hours to train a pet and you get a clean kitchen/bathroom.
Manhattan preferred, but may consider something no more than a couple stops out of Manhattan by subway.
If you are also submissive, curious or just a nice guy with a dirty apt that's a plus.
Email me a bit about you and I'd be happy to send more details.
:) peace
